nodes.text: Aved Luun was a female Jawa who was the mate of Jawa Chief Kalit and a shaman for his tribe. During the Galactic Civil War, she suspected a betrayal at her husband's peace talks with Wittin at Jabba's Palace in 4 ABY. That year, both Luun and Kalit were present when the Heroes of Yavin arrived to rescue Rebel Alliance General Han Solo.

It appears that Decipher, Inc. cropped an image of a Jawa depicted in production photos from Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi to portray Aved Luun, however, it has not been officially confirmed that these two Jawas are one and the same.
